name: J2ME Advanced GUI Component
short_description: Custom J2ME components for advanced GUI display. Among them are an advanced ticker component which can be added into any List or Form componet, and cHTML display component to display cHTML, graphics and animated GIF. Latest code at http://zopensource.com
